about.title: About Dilkor
about.subtitle: Dilkor - Where Hearts Meet
about.description: More than just a matchmaking platform â€“ we're a community dedicated to helping people find meaningful connections and build lasting relationships.
about.missionDescription: At Dilkor, we believe that everyone deserves to find their perfect match. Our mission is to create a safe, secure, and user-friendly platform that brings people together based on shared values, interests, and compatibility.
about.missionDescription2: We combine traditional values with modern technology to make the journey of finding your life partner both meaningful and enjoyable.
about.trustDesc: We prioritize user safety and verify all profiles to ensure authenticity and build a trustworthy community.
about.privacyDesc: Your personal information is protected with industry-leading security and comprehensive privacy controls.
about.authenticityDesc: We encourage genuine connections and honest communication to help you find your true match.
about.storyPara1: Founded with the vision of modernizing traditional matchmaking, Dilkor was born from the understanding that finding a life partner is one of the most important decisions in one's life.
about.storyPara2: Our journey began with a simple idea: to create a safe space where individuals and families could connect based on compatibility, shared values, and mutual respect.
about.storyPara3: We combine cutting-edge technology with personal touch, ensuring that every match suggestion is thoughtful and every interaction is secure.
about.joinJourneyDesc: Be part of a community that believes in meaningful connections and lasting relationships.
about.authenticConnectionsDesc: Building genuine relationships based on trust
about.userSafetyDesc: Prioritizing security and privacy at every step

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to find your perfect match
howItWorks.pageSubtitle: Finding your perfect match is just a few simple steps away. Here's how Dilkor works.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Download the Dilkor app from Google Play Store or Apple App Store. Create your account with your email or phone number and verify your identity.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Build a comprehensive profile that showcases who you are. Add your photos, education, profession, interests, and preferences to help find the perfect match.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Our AI-powered algorithm suggests compatible matches based on your preferences, interests, and values. Browse through profiles and express interest.
howItWorks.step4Desc: When there's mutual interest, start a conversation. Use our secure messaging platform to get to know each other better.
howItWorks.readyToStartDesc: The Dilkor app is coming soon. Stay tuned for the launch!

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Love Stories
successStories.description: Real couples, real stories, real happiness. Read how Dilkor helped thousands find their perfect match.
successStories.joinMessage: Join thousands of happy couples who found their perfect match on Dilkor
successStories.story1: We matched on Dilkor in January 2024, and from our very first conversation, we knew there was something special. The platform's detailed profiles helped us understand each other's values and aspirations before we even met. Six months later, we're happily married!
successStories.story2: After trying several matrimonial platforms, Dilkor stood out with its focus on compatibility and genuine profiles. We connected through shared interests in travel and photography. The social media features helped us share our moments and get to know each other better despite being in different cities.
successStories.story3: As working professionals, we appreciated Dilkor's efficient matching algorithm that saved us time. Within weeks, we found each other, and the rest is history. The platform made it easy to connect with someone who truly understood our lifestyle and values.
successStories.story4: We were both looking for partners from our community, and Dilkor's advanced filters made it easy to find compatible matches. The verification process gave us confidence that profiles were genuine. Thank you Dilkor for bringing us together!
successStories.story5: Long-distance relationships can be challenging, but Dilkor's secure messaging and social media features made it easier for us to stay connected and share our daily moments. We're grateful for this platform that prioritizes safety and privacy while helping people find love.
successStories.story6: Traditional values meet modern technology - that's what Dilkor represents for us. Our families were involved in the process, and the platform's family-friendly approach made everything smooth. We couldn't have asked for a better matchmaking experience.
successStories.testimonial1: Best matrimonial app! Found my perfect match within 3 months. Highly recommended!
successStories.testimonial2: User-friendly interface and genuine profiles. The verification process is excellent!
successStories.testimonial3: Great support team and advanced features. Made finding my soulmate so much easier!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Dilkor
faq.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
faq.q1: How do I create an account on Dilkor?
faq.a1: Download the Dilkor app from Google Play Store or Apple App Store. Sign up using your email or phone number, verify your account, and complete your profile with accurate information.
faq.a2: Yes, Dilkor offers a free basic membership that allows you to create a profile, browse matches, and send limited messages. Premium features are available through subscription plans.
faq.q3: How long does profile verification take?
faq.a3: Profile verification typically takes 24-48 hours. We thoroughly review each profile to ensure authenticity and safety for all our users.
faq.q4: How is my personal information protected?
faq.a4: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data. Your information is never shared with third parties without your consent, and you have complete control over your privacy settings.
faq.q5: Can I hide my profile from certain people?
faq.a5: Yes, you can block specific users or hide your profile from non-members. Premium users have additional privacy controls including incognito mode.
faq.a6: We verify profiles through multiple methods including phone verification, email verification, document verification, and photo verification to ensure authenticity.
faq.q7: How does the matching algorithm work?
faq.a7: Our AI-powered algorithm considers your preferences, interests, values, and compatibility factors to suggest the most suitable matches. The more complete your profile, the better the matches.
faq.q8: Can I search for specific criteria?
faq.a8: Yes, you can use advanced filters to search by age, location, education, profession, religion, community, and many other criteria to find your ideal match.
faq.q9: How can I contact my matches?
faq.a9: You can send interests, messages, or share posts and stories with your matches. Free users have limited messaging capabilities, while premium members enjoy unlimited communication.
faq.a10: We offer monthly, quarterly, and annual subscription plans with varying features. Premium plans include unlimited messaging, advanced search, profile visibility boost, and more.
faq.q11: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.a11: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings. Your premium features will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
faq.a12: Refund policies vary based on your location and the type of subscription. Please refer to our Terms & Conditions or contact support for specific refund requests.
faq.q13: The app is not working properly. What should I do?
faq.a13: Try updating to the latest version of the app, clearing cache, or reinstalling. If the issue persists, contact our support team with details about the problem.
faq.q14: How do I report a suspicious profile?
faq.a14: You can report any profile by clicking the 'Report' option on their profile page. Our team will investigate and take appropriate action within 24 hours.
faq.q15: Can I use Dilkor on multiple devices?
faq.a15: Yes, you can log in to your account on multiple devices. Your data syncs automatically across all devices.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.questionsDesc: We're here to help. Contact our privacy team for any concerns.
privacy.intro: At Dilkor, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and services.
privacy.personalInfoDesc: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacy.personalInfoItem1: Name, age, gender, and contact information
privacy.autoCollectedItem1: Device information (model, operating system, unique identifiers)
privacy.autoCollectedItem2: Usage data (features used, time spent, interactions)
privacy.section2Intro: We use the collected information for:
privacy.section2Item1: Providing and maintaining our matchmaking services
privacy.section2Item3: Suggesting compatible matches using our algorithm
privacy.section2Item5: Verifying profiles and ensuring platform safety
privacy.section2Item6: Improving our services and user experience
privacy.section2Item7: Sending you updates, notifications, and promotional materials
privacy.section3Intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacy.section3Item1Desc: Your profile information is visible to other users as per your privacy settings
privacy.section3Item2Desc: Third-party vendors who assist in operating our platform
privacy.section3Item3Desc: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.section3Item4Desc: In case of merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
privacy.section3Item5Desc: When you explicitly agree to share information
privacy.section4Intro: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
privacy.section4Item1: End-to-end encryption for messages and calls
privacy.section5Item1: Access and review your personal information
privacy.section5Item3: Delete your account and associated data
privacy.section5Item6: Request a copy of your data
privacy.section5Item7: Object to certain data processing activities
privacy.section6Desc: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your information, except where we need to retain it for legal obligations or legitimate business purposes.
privacy.section7Desc: Dilkor is not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If we become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, we will delete it immediately.
privacy.section8Desc: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacy.section9Desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
privacy.section10Intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.questionsDesc: Our legal team is here to help clarify any questions about our terms.
terms.intro: Welcome to Dilkor. By accessing or using our mobile application and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully.
terms.acknowledgement: By using Dilkor, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
terms.section1Desc: By creating an account or using Dilkor, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
terms.section2Item1: Be at least 18 years of age
terms.section2Item2: Be legally eligible to marry under the laws of your jurisdiction
terms.section2Item3: Not be currently married (unless seeking second marriage with legal approval)
terms.section2Item5: Not have been previously banned from the platform
terms.section3Intro: When creating an account, you agree to:
terms.section3Item1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
terms.section3Item2: Maintain and update your information to keep it accurate
terms.section3Item3: Keep your login credentials secure and confidential
terms.section3Item4: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
terms.section3Item5: Be responsible for all activities under your account
terms.section4Item1: Provide false, misleading, or fraudulent information
terms.section4Item2: Use the service for commercial or promotional purposes
terms.section4Item3: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
terms.section4Item4: Share inappropriate, offensive, or illegal content
terms.section4Item6: Create multiple accounts or share your account
terms.section4Item7: Use automated systems to access the platform
terms.section4Item8: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
terms.section5Para1: You retain ownership of the content you post, but grant Dilkor a license to use, display, and distribute it for the purpose of operating and promoting our services.
terms.section5Para2: All platform content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, software, and design, is the property of Dilkor and protected by intellectual property laws.
terms.section6Intro: Premium features require a paid subscription:
terms.section6Item2: Prices are subject to change with notice
terms.section6Item3: Refunds are provided as per our refund policy
terms.section6Item4: Payment is processed through secure third-party providers
terms.section6Item5: You are responsible for all charges incurred
terms.section7Desc: Your use of Dilkor is also governed by our Privacy Policy. We collect, use, and protect your personal information as described in our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to such processing.
terms.section8Intro: While we verify profiles and maintain safety measures, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of user information or the conduct of users. You are responsible for:
terms.section8Item1: Verifying the identity and information of other users
terms.section8Item2: Taking precautions when meeting in person
terms.section8Item4: Following safety guidelines provided by us
terms.section9Item1: Suspend or terminate your account for violating these terms
terms.section9Item2: Remove any content that violates our policies
terms.section9Item3: Refuse service to anyone at any time
terms.section9Item4: Modify or discontinue the service with or without notice
terms.section9Para: You may delete your account at any time from your account settings.
terms.section10Intro: Dilkor is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee:
terms.section10Item1: That you will find a suitable match
terms.section10Item2: The accuracy or reliability of user content
terms.section10Para: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.
terms.section11Desc: You agree to indemnify and hold Dilkor harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the service, violation of these terms, or infringement of any third-party rights.
terms.section12Desc: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of courts in Mumbai, India.
terms.section13Desc: We may modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms. We will notify you of significant changes.
terms.section14Intro: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:
